channel.title: Starting items
channel.description: where can i edit what items ppl have when they start and where they are?

item.title: Starting items
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

to edit the items that they have in theyâ€™re inventory, go into player.java and find this part:

for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { //Setting player items playerItems[0] = 996; } for (int i = 0; i<playerItemsN.length; i++) { //Setting Item amounts playerItemsN[0] = 1000000; }

then change the code and amount to whatever you want. if you want them to be wearing an item when they start, find this:

playerEquipment[playerHat]=1050; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1035; playerEquipment[playerShield]=3840; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1033; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4675;

once again, edit the codes to your liking

Read full topic
